name: Demolish
help: Delivers An Attack With A Potency Of 30.  70 When Executed From Behind Target.  Can Only Be Used When In Coeurl Form.  Additional Effect: Damage Over Time  Potency: 40  Duration: 21s  Additional Effect: Changes Form To Opo-opo  Duration: 10s  Additional Effect: Grants Greased Lightning   Duration: 14s (PvP 28s)  Greased Lightning Bonus: Increases Damage Dealt By 10% And Attack Speed By 5%
help_html: Delivers An Attack With A Potency Of 30. 70 When Executed From Behind Target. Can Only Be Used When In Coeurl Form. Additional Effect: Damage Over Time Potency: 40 Duration: 21s Additional Effect: Changes Form To Opo-opo Duration: 10s Additional Effect: Grants Greased Lightning Duration: 14s (PvP 28s) Greased Lightning Bonus: Increases Damage Dealt By 10% And Attack Speed By 5%
